user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on our current project status. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Request: Project Status Update for Sarah

Hi John,

Could you please send Sarah a concise update on our current project status for the investment-strategy presentation? You can pull the latest details from your Gmail threads and the Notion workspace (especially the “Sterling Strategy – Draft” and “Action Items” pages).

A brief summary of completed tasks, pending items, and next steps would be perfect. If you could share it with her by the end of the day, that would really help keep us aligned.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
